Kapolri Idham Aziz Mendapat Kenaikan Pangkat Menjadi Jenderal Polisi
01 Nov 2019, 03:38 by Siska Nirmala
JAKARTA, (PR).- Kapolri Jenderal Pol Idham Azis mendapatkan kenaikan pangkat dari tadinya Komisaris Jenderal (Komjen) menjadi Jenderal.
Seperti dilansir Kantor Berita Antara, kenaikan pangkat tersebut berdasarkan Keppres No 98 Polri 2019 tentang Kenaikan Pangkat dalam jabatan Perwira Tinggi Polri yang memutuskan menaikkan pangkat satu tingkat lebih tinggi perwira tinggi atas nama Idham Azis NRP 63010868 menjadi Jenderal Polisi terhitung 1 November 2019.
Beberapa saat sebelumnya, Presiden Jokowi telah melantik Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri berdasarkan Keputusan Presiden No 97 Polri 2019 tentang Pengangkatan Komjen Polisi Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri pada Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Setelah mengucapkan sumpah, Idham lalu menandatangani berita acara yang disaksikan mantan Kapolri Tito Karnavian dan Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto.
Hadir dalam pelantikan tersebut Wakil Presiden Ma'ruf Amin, Presiden ke-5 Megawati Soekarnoputri Ketua MPR Bambang Soesatyo, Ketua DPR Puan Maharani, Ketua Mahkamah Konstitusi Anwar Usman, Ketua Mahkamah Agung Hatta Ali, Ketua BPK Agung Firman, Kepala Badan Intelijen Negara Budi Gunawan, Jaksa Agung TB Burhanuddin, Ketua KPK Agus Rahardjo, para menteri Kabinet Indonesia Maju, para wakil Ketua MPR dan DPR Kapolda dari berbagai daerah, para perwira tinggi Polri lainnya.
DPR mengesahkan Komjen Pol Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri menggantikan Tito Karnavian dalam rapat paripurna di Gedung DPR pada Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019. Rapat dipimpin langsung oleh Ketua DPR Puan Maharani.
Sebelumnya, Komisi III DPR secara aklamasi telah menyetujui Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri setelah melakukan uji kelayakan Idham Aziz pada Rabu, 30 Oktober 2019. Dalam uji kelayakan itu, Idham menyampaikan visi misinya sebagai Kapolri.
Dilansir Kantor Berita Antara, Idham Azis dalam paparan punya tujuh program prioritas yang akan dieksekusi jika diberi tugas sebagai Kapolri. Tujuh program prioritas yakni mewujudkan SDM yang unggul, penataan kelembagaan, pemantapan harkamtibmas, penegakan hukum yang profesional dan berkeadilan, manajemen media, penguatan sinergi polisional dan penguatan pengawasan.
Dari program penataan kelembagaan salah satu yang ditekankan adalah memperkuat budaya antikorupsi dengan memperbanyak wilayah zona integritas (wilayah bebas korupsi dan wilayah birokrasi bersih melayani).
Idham Azis adalah lulusan Akpol 1988, terakhir menjabat sebagai Kepala Badan Reserse Kriminal Polri dan pernah juga menjabat sebagai Kapolra Metro Jaya.
Ia tercatat pernah melumpuhkan dalang teror bom Bali Dr. Azahari di Batu, Malang, Jawa Timur, pada 2005. Saat itu, Idham menjabat Kepala Unit Riksa Subden Investigasi Densus Polri. Idham melaksanakan operasi bersama Tito Karnavian, Petrus Reinhard Golose, serta Rycko Amelza Dahniel dan lainnya. Mereka pun mendapat kenaikan pangkat luar biasa dari Kapolri (saat itu) Jenderal Sutanto.
Idham juga sering dilibatkan dalam tim satuan tugas untuk mengungkap perkara-perkara yang menjadi sorotan publik karena punya latar belakang sebagai reserse dan antiteror.
Pada bulan Desember 2001, Idham tercatat menjadi anggota Tim Kobra untuk menangkap Hutomo Mandala Putra alias Tommy Soeharto di bawah pimpinan Tito Karnavian. Saat itu Idham bertugas di Unit Harda Polda Metro Jaya.
Selanjutnya, Idham juga ikut menumpas dua teroris kelompok Santoso di Poso, Sulawesi Tengah. Saat itu Idham menjabat sebagai Kapolda Sulawesi Tengah.
Saat menjabat Direktur Reserse Kriminal Umum Polda Metro Jaya, Idham mengungkap pelaku kasus pembunuhan dan sodomi 14 anak jalanan yang ditangkap pada tanggal 9 Januari 2010.
Saat jadi Kapolda Metro Jaya, Idham mengungkap kasus penyelundupan narkotika jenis ganja seberat 1,3 ton dari Aceh ke Jakarta dan penyelundupan sabu-sabu 1,6 ton dari Taiwan di Anyer, Banten dan menjaga situasi keamanan di Jakarta tetap kondusif saat Ibu Kota menjadi tuan rumah perhelatan Asian Games 2018.
Idham juga terlibat dalam Operasi Camar Maleo bersama TNI untuk menangkap kelompok teroris Santoso di wilayah pegunungan Poso, Sulawesi Tengah, awal tahun 2015.***

National Police Chief Idham Aziz Gets promoted to become police general
Nov 01 2019, 03:38 by Siska Nirmala
JAKARTA, (PR) .- National Police Chief General Pol Idham Azis received a promotion from being a Commissioner General (Komjen) to General.
As reported by the Antara News Agency, the promotion was based on Presidential Decree No. 98 of 2019 regarding Promotions in the position of Polri High Officers who decided to raise the rank of a higher ranking officer on behalf of Idham Azis NRP 63010868 to General Police as of November 1, 2019.
Shortly beforehand, President Jokowi had installed Idham Azis as National Police Chief based on Presidential Decree No. 97 of 2019 regarding the Appointment of Police Commissioner Idham Azis as National Police Chief on Friday, November 1, 2019.
After taking the oath, Idham then signed the minutes witnessed by former National Police Chief Tito Karnavian and TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto.
Present at the inauguration were Vice President Ma'ruf Amin, 5th President Megawati Soekarnoputri MPR Chair Bambang Soesatyo, DPR Chairperson Puan Maharani, Chairperson of Constitutional Court Anwar Usman, Chairperson of Supreme Court Hatta Ali, Chairperson of BPK Supreme Firman, Head of State Intelligence Agency Budi Gunawan Budi Gunawan , Attorney General TB Burhanuddin, KPK Chair Agus Rahardjo, Ministers of the Indonesian Cabinet Forward, Deputy Chairpersons of the MPR and DPR Kapolda from various regions, other high-ranking police officers.
The House of Representatives endorsed Komjen Pol Idham Azis as National Police Chief replacing Tito Karnavian in a plenary meeting at the Parliament Building on Thursday, October 31, 2019. The meeting was chaired directly by the Speaker of the Parliament Puan Maharani.
Previously, the House of Representatives Commission III unanimously approved Idham Azis as National Police Chief after conducting the feasibility test on Idham Aziz on Wednesday, October 30, 2019. In the due diligence, Idham conveyed his vision and mission as National Police.
Reported by Antara News Agency, Idham Azis in his presentation has seven priority programs that will be executed if given the task as National Police Chief. The seven priority programs are realizing superior human resources, institutional arrangement, strengthening Harkamtibmas, fair and professional law enforcement, media management, strengthening synergy polisional and strengthening supervision.
One of the institutional structuring programs that was emphasized was strengthening the culture of anti-corruption by increasing the area of integrity zones (corruption-free areas and clean bureaucratic areas serving).
Idham Azis is a 1988 Akpol graduate, most recently served as the Head of the Indonesian Police Criminal Investigation Agency and has also served as the Chief of Metro Jaya Police.
He was noted to have paralyzed the mastermind of the Bali bomb terror Dr. Azahari in Batu, Malang, East Java, in 2005. At that time, Idham was the Head of the Police Detachment Investigation Subden Investigation Unit. Idham carried out operations with Tito Karnavian, Petrus Reinhard Golose, and Rycko Amelza Dahniel and others. They also received an extraordinary promotion from the National Police Chief (then) General Sutanto.
Idham is also often involved in task force teams to uncover cases that are in the public spotlight because they have a background as a detective and antiterror.
In December 2001, Idham was recorded as a member of the Cobra Team to capture Hutomo Mandala Putra alias Tommy Soeharto under the leadership of Tito Karnavian. At that time Idham was in charge of the Metro Jaya Police Harda Unit.
Furthermore, Idham also helped crush two Santoso terrorist groups in Poso, Central Sulawesi. At that time Idham was the Central Sulawesi Regional Police Chief.
While serving as Director of the Jakarta Police's General Criminal Investigation, Idham revealed the perpetrators of the murder and sodomy of 14 street children who were arrested on January 9, 2010.
When he was the Jakarta Police Chief, Idham revealed the case of smuggling 1.3 tonnes of cannabis from Aceh to Jakarta and 1.6 tonnes of methamphetamine smuggling from Taiwan in Anyer, Banten and maintaining the security situation in Jakarta remained conducive when the capital was hosting home of the 2018 Asian Games event.
Idham was also involved in Operation Male Gull with the TNI to arrest the Santoso terrorist group in the mountainous region of Poso, Central Sulawesi, in early 2015. ***
